mapper.insert: insert into tb_scheduled_time( day, time_name, sale_starttime, sale_endtime, yd_starttime, yd_endtime, category_idstr, updatetime ) values ( #{day}, #{time_name}, #{sale_starttime}, #{sale_endtime}, #{yd_starttime}, #{yd_endtime}, #{category_idstr}, now() )
mapper.update: update tb_scheduled_time set day= #{day}, time_name= #{time_name}, sale_starttime= #{sale_starttime}, sale_endtime= #{sale_endtime}, yd_starttime= #{yd_starttime} , yd_endtime= #{yd_endtime} , category_idstr= #{category_idstr} where scheduled_time_id = #{scheduled_time_id}
mapper.select: select scheduled_time_id, day, time_name, sale_starttime, sale_endtime, date_format(yd_starttime ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as yd_starttime, date_format(yd_endtime ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as yd_endtime, category_idstr, updatetime from tb_scheduled_time where scheduled_time_id = #{scheduled_time_id}

select a.scheduled_time_id, a.day, a.time_name, a.sale_starttime, a.sale_endtime, date_format(yd_starttime ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as yd_starttime, date_format(yd_endtime ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as yd_endtime, a.category_idstr, a.updatetime from tb_scheduled_time a order by a.day desc

select scheduled_time_id, day, time_name, sale_starttime, sale_endtime, date_format(yd_starttime ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as yd_starttime, date_format(yd_endtime ,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as yd_endtime, unix_timestamp(now())-unix_timestamp(yd_starttime) as b1, unix_timestamp(yd_endtime)-unix_timestamp(now()) as b2, category_idstr, updatetime from tb_scheduled_time where day = #{day} order by updatetime desc limit 1

select b.category_id, b.lunch_id, b.lunch_name, b.yd_images, b.sale_money, b.show_sale_money, ifnull(b.yd_stocknumber,'0') as yd_stocknumber, IFNULL(b.send_integral,0) as send_integral, (b.sale_money-IFNULL(b.send_integral,0)) as daoshoumoney from tb_scheduled_time a left join tb_lunch b on a.category_idstr like concat(concat('%',b.category_id),'%') where a.day=#{day} and b.category_id=#{category_id}
